page.title: 07Religion
page.content:
The East Window design theme is a symbolic treatment of the Holy Trinity and also shows types of people over the centuries who may have been worshippers in the countryside where the church was built. { { _______________
The Village Stores { ______________________ This is a small general store called the Red House owned by Mr and Mrs Willis who have owned the shop since 1983.During its history it has been a slaughter house, bakery, a dairy and a mill.There is a spring in the back garden from which a group of cottages next door take their name. There is an arch way leading to the field though which coaches used to go.
